actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that certain persons with a service-connected disability of 30 percent or more, will have two years in which to apply for service Disabled Veterans Insurance (RH).

summary.text: Authorizes a person who has been released from active service and who suffers an increase in a service-connected disability to 30 percent or more to apply for National Service Life Insurance anytime within two years from the date that the increase in the service-connected disability is determined by the Veterans' Administration.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that certain persons with a service-connected disability of 30 percent or more, will have two years in which to apply for service Disabled Veterans Insurance (RH).
